BRAZIL-EAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 02 SEP BY
   M/V HAWK EXPLORER TOWING 6.5 MILE LONG CABLES
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   13-34.6S 038-35.5W, 13-00.8S 038-02.8W,
   13-00.9S 036-16.6W, 13-31.8S 036-22.6W,
   16-00.0S 036-19.5W, 16-00.4S 037-43.9W,
   15-27.5S 038-15.3W, 14-44.9S 038-35.5W,
   13-34.6S 038-35.5W.
   EIGHT MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 03 SEP 12.
